thread.title: SANDEEP

author: SANDEEP
title: SANDEEP
text:
SENT AN INTERNATIONALN PARCEL BUT CANT DELIVER IN TIME ,SPOKE TO CUSTOMER SERVICE(UK) THEY ARE SEEMS TO BE NOT BOTHERED AND LYING TO ME IT WAS WITH CUSTOMS BUT DELIVER DRIVER CAME TO RECEIVER HOME AND DIDNT BOTHER TO CALL THE RECEIVER AND SAID TO COLLECT ONE OF THEIR BRANCH IN HYDERABAD,BUT THE CUSTOMER SERVICE(UK) HAVNT GOT ANY INFORMATION AND LYING TO ME ITS WITH CUSTOMS
I NEVER USE U R SERVICE IN LIFE
